alert.note: Alert for Mahnomen; South Clearwater (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 5:39PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Mahnomen and southwestern Clearwater Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 539 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Naytahwaush, or 31 miles north of Detroit Lakes, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Naytahwaush, Rice Lake, Roy Lake, Mahkonce and western Lower Rice Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
